channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 13th January
item.description:
Customer has mentioned that the lights were installed on Friday and no works were being down over the weekend and just set it up ready for Monday. The permit does not match with the exact location of the works. Tail backs of at least 1KM. He i wondering what is happening with this?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Many potholes around traffic calming measures, one dangerous, 13th January
item.description:
Multiple potholes of varying size in centre of carriageway all down Albert Road, plus unavoidable large and dangerous potholes adjacent to traffic calming measures. Poor previous repairs also failing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
